articles.title: Bulk Deals | Ipca Labs picks 33.38% stake in Unichem; Madhusudan Kela’s wife buys 5.3% stake in Niyogin - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Though huge buying was seen in Campus Activewear, the stock fell 4.3 percent to Rs 290 amid weak equity market conditions
articles.content: Ipca Laboratories picked a 33.38 percent stake in Unichem Laboratories via open market transactions on August 2, after getting approval from the Competition Commission of India. Ipca shares fell 1.6 … [+2332 chars]

articles.author: ETtech
articles.title: SaaS startup Actyv.ai fires 60 staffers as market downturn bites - The Economic Times
articles.description: The layoffs were a result of a right-sizing initiative in response to prevailing market conditions, a company statement said.
articles.content: Actyv.ai, an enterprise software-as-a-service startup, on Wednesday said it has laid off 60 staffers.The layoffs were a result of a right-sizing initiative in response to prevailing market conditions… [+2134 chars]

articles.author: G Balachandar
articles.title: IOB bucks the Q1 industry trend to grow CASA in absolute & percentage terms - BusinessLine
articles.description: The Bank’s CASA ratio improved to 44.14 per cent in Q1 of this fiscal from 43.07 per cent in the year-ago quarter and 43.74 per cent in March 2023 quarter. Total CASA increased to ₹1,16,694 crore as on June 30, 2023, from ₹ 1,12,012 crore a year-ago.
articles.content: Indian Overseas Bank (IOB) has probably become the only bank that has managed to improve its CASA (Current account-Savings account) ratio year-on-year and quarter-on-quarter basis as the Chennai-head… [+3325 chars]

articles.author: Shubhangi Mathur
articles.title: Gujarat Gas Q1 results: Net profit tanks 43% to Rs 216 crore - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Gujarat Gas Q1 results: The gas distribution company's revenue declined 26.2 percent to Rs 3,924 crore
articles.content:
Gujarat Gas Limited on August 2 reported a 43.4 percent year-on-year decline in consolidated net profit at Rs 216 crore in the first quarter of the financial year 2023-24.
The city gas distribution … [+1591 chars]

articles.author: ETtech
articles.title: Foxconn to invest $600 million in Karnataka for iPhone component and semiconductor facilities - The Economic Times
articles.description: The proposals are part of the Taiwanese giants broader strategy to diversify away from China to insulate itself from any aftershocks arising from the growing tensions between Washington and Beijing.
articles.content: Electronics contract manufacturer Hon Hai Technology Group (Foxconn), the worlds largest contract manufacturer, will invest about $600 million (Rs 5,000 crore) to set up iPhone component and semicond… [+4265 chars]

articles.author: Kumar Shankar Roy & BL Research Bureau
articles.title: Bajaj Finserv Flexi Cap NFO: Should you invest? - BusinessLine
articles.description: Bajaj Finserv AMC has launched its first equity scheme - Bajaj Finserv Flexi Cap Fund. It invests across large-cap, mid-cap, and small-cap stocks and is managed by experienced professionals. Flexi-cap funds are a good investment avenue for those with an avera…
